data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent:
Trisha: Ali, I love those new earrings. They ____ gorgeous ____ you.
Ali: Thanks, how ____ of ____! I ____ yours ____ well.
Trisha: Let ____ be ____ - ____ don't ____ to ____ a ____ statement ____ because I gave ____. It makes the thing that you say seem dishonest
data.partBlankContent:
Trisha: Ali, I love those new earrings. They a__ gorgeous o_ you.
Ali: Thanks, how ki__ of y__! I lo__ yours a_ well.
Trisha: Let m_ be dir___ - y__ don't ha__ to ret___ a ki__ statement ju__ because I gave o__. It makes the thing that you say seem dishonest
data.answer:
泰瑞莎:阿里，我喜欢你的新耳环。它们穿在你身上真漂亮。
阿里:谢谢，你真好!我也爱你的。
特丽莎:让我直接说吧——你不必因为我说了一句好话就去回敬我。这会让你说的话显得不诚实
